snippet: Scientists counting Antarctica’s emperor penguins from space have found twice as many of them as expected.
abstract: Scientists counting Antarctica’s emperor penguins from space put the total population at 595,000, roughly double previous estimates of 270,000 to 350,000.
lead_paragraph: Scientists counting Antarctica’s emperor penguins from space have found twice as many of them as expected.

headline.seo: Scientists Find Twice As Many Emperor Penguins in Antarctica
headline.main: Even From Afar, a Distinctive Look
headline.print_headline: Even From Afar, a Distinctive Look
